title: ARAM REROLL FUNCTION
body:
I am such a dumbass for thinking that if I be nice and share my rerolls people would be nice too and wouldn't cheat me.

Was playing aram and I got {{champion:22}} , this dude got {{champion:84}}  but didn't want her. I offered to reroll, used my two rerolls and ended up with {{champion:86}} . Don't get me wrong, I like {{champion:86}}  but I just feel so cheated.

 Then he had the nerve to deny what happened and pretend he was afk and never saw the conditions I gave (giving back {{champion:22}} ) for the rerolls. Apparently he was afk but he somehow managed to accept the trade, change keystones, masteries and summoner spells. Afk my ass. Never sharing my rerolls again. Lesson Learned. We lost the game. Rant over.

replies.body:
Genuinely might have been afk 
Its not unheard of people to get set up for the game (summoners, masteries etc) and then quickly pop off to the bathroom or get a drink (or any other short activity) , whilst the champ select/loading screen does its thing 

Whilst i agree it can be annoying if these people arent back as soon as the game starts (mostly in Aram, normals you have the time before minions spawn where the majority of players effectively afk)
Whenever you gamble my friend, sometimes you lose.
